Tag.description: Tag is a key-value pair associated with accelerator.

Key.description: Key of the tag. Value can be 1 to 127 characters.

Value.description: Value for the tag. Value can be 1 to 255 characters.

Name.markdownDescription:
Name of accelerator.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 64  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{0,64}$  

Update requires: No interruption

IpAddressType.markdownDescription:
IP Address type.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

IpAddresses.description: The IP addresses from BYOIP Prefix pool.
IpAddresses.markdownDescription:
The IP addresses from BYOIP Prefix pool.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

Enabled.description: Indicates whether an accelerator is enabled. The value is true or false.
Enabled.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether an accelerator is enabled. The value is true or false.

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption

DnsName.description: The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to your accelerator's static IPv4 addresses.
DnsName.markdownDescription:
The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to your accelerator's static IPv4 addresses.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to your accelerator's static IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.
